analytic.title: The Nomocanon of Metropolitan ‘Abdiso‘ of Nisibis: Ms. No. 64 in the Collection of Trichur (Trissur), Metropolitan’s Palace of the Church of the East

monogr.title: The Nomocanon of Abdisho of Nisibis: A Facsimile Edition of MS 64 from the Collection of the Church of the East in Thrissur

body.bibl: Kaufhold, Hubert. “The Nomocanon of Metropolitan ‘Abdiso‘ of Nisibis: Ms. No. 64 in the Collection of Trichur (Trissur), Metropolitan’s Palace of the Church of the East.” In The Nomocanon of Abdisho of Nisibis: A Facsimile Edition of MS 64 from the Collection of the Church of the East in Thrissur, edited by István Perczel, xi–xxiii. Syriac Manuscripts from Malabar 1. Piscataway, New Jersey: Gorgias Press, 2005.

Hubert Kaufhold, The Nomocanon of Metropolitan ‘Abdiso‘ of Nisibis: Ms. No. 64 in the Collection of Trichur (Trissur), Metropolitan’s Palace of the Church of the East, in The Nomocanon of Abdisho of Nisibis: A Facsimile Edition of MS 64 from the Collection of the Church of the East in Thrissur, ed. István Perczel, Syriac Manuscripts from Malabar 1 (Piscataway, New Jersey: Gorgias Press, 2005), xi–xxiii.
